custom-sql.sql: SELECT opencps_serviceprocess.* FROM opencps_serviceprocess WHERE (groupId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_serviceprocess.processName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceprocess.processNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]))

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_serviceprocess WHERE (groupId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_serviceprocess.processName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceprocess.processNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]))

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT opencps_processorder.processOrderId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId AND opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = ? INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId AND opencps_processstep.processStepId = ? INNER JOIN ( SELECT opencps_stepallowance.processStepId,opencps_stepallowance.readOnly FROM opencps_stepallowance INNER JOIN ( SELECT role_.roleId FROM role_ INNER JOIN users_roles ON role_.roleId = users_roles.roleId WHERE users_roles.userId = ? ) AS role ON opencps_stepallowance.roleId = role.roleId ) AS stepallowance ON stepallowance.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId OR opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_processorder.*, opencps_dossier.serviceConfigId, opencps_dossier.subjectId, opencps_dossier.subjectName, opencps_dossier.receptionNo, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName, opencps_processstep.stepName, opencps_processstep.sequenceNo, opencps_processstep.daysDuration, opencps_processstep.referenceDossierPartId, stepallowance.readOnly FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId AND opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = ? INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId AND opencps_processstep.processStepId = ? INNER JOIN ( SELECT opencps_stepallowance.processStepId,opencps_stepallowance.readOnly FROM opencps_stepallowance INNER JOIN ( SELECT role_.roleId FROM role_ INNER JOIN users_roles ON role_.roleId = users_roles.roleId WHERE users_roles.userId = ? ) AS role ON opencps_stepallowance.roleId = role.roleId ) AS stepallowance ON stepallowance.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId OR opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ? ORDER BY opencps_processorder.modifiedDate DESC, opencps_processorder.actionDatetime DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT opencps_processorder.processOrderId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId AND opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = ? INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId AND opencps_processstep.processStepId = ? WHERE opencps_processorder.actionUserId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_processorder.*, opencps_dossier.serviceConfigId, opencps_dossier.subjectId, opencps_dossier.subjectName, opencps_dossier.receptionNo, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName, opencps_processstep.stepName, opencps_processstep.sequenceNo, opencps_processstep.daysDuration, opencps_processstep.referenceDossierPartId FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId AND opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = ? INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId AND opencps_processstep.processStepId = ? WHERE opencps_processorder.actionUserId = ?
ORDER BY opencps_processorder.modifiedDate DESC, opencps_processorder.actionDatetime DESC

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_processstep.processStepId, opencps_processstep.stepName FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId AND opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = ?
INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId WHERE opencps_processorder.processStepId IN ( SELECT opencps_stepallowance.processStepId FROM opencps_stepallowance INNER JOIN ( SELECT role_.roleId FROM role_ INNER JOIN users_roles ON role_.roleId = users_roles.roleId WHERE users_roles.userId = ? ) AS role ON opencps_stepallowance.roleId = role.roleId ) OR opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT opencps_actionhistory.* FROM opencps_actionhistory INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_actionhistory.processOrderId=opencps_processorder.processOrderId WHERE (opencps_actionhistory.groupId = ?) AND opencps_processorder.dossierId=?

SELECT * FROM opencps_processworkflow WHERE preProcessStepId = ? AND serviceProcessId = ? AND ( autoEvent = 'minutely' OR autoEvent = '5-minutely' OR autoEvent = 'hourly' OR autoEvent = 'daily' OR autoEvent = 'weekly' )

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId
WHERE opencps_processorder.processStepId IN ( SELECT opencps_stepallowance.processStepId FROM opencps_stepallowance INNER JOIN ( SELECT role_.roleId FROM role_ INNER JOIN users_roles ON role_.roleId = users_roles.roleId WHERE users_roles.userId = ? ) AS role ON opencps_stepallowance.roleId = role.roleId )
OR opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ? ORDER BY opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName ASC

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId WHERE opencps_processorder.actionUserId = ? ORDER BY opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName ASC

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_processstep.processStepId, opencps_processstep.stepName FROM opencps_processorder INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId AND opencps_processorder.serviceInfoId = ?
INNER JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processorder.processStepId = opencps_processstep.processStepId WHERE opencps_processorder.actionUserId = ?
